TableField.name: LossProdServAssnID
TableField.phrase: Loss Association ID|An automatically assigned number used to track losses associated with products and/or services

TableField.name: LossProdServID
TableField.phrase: Loss ID|An automatically assigned number used to track losses associated with products and/or services

ForeignField.name: LossProdServ
ForeignField.phrase: Loss Product or Service|A combined field used to describe this product or service loss when associating it with other records
ForeignField.sample: Mattias Thorslund; Active Agenda, HQ; Packaging Area; 01-01-2004

TableField.name: ProdServID
TableField.phrase: Product or Service|A combined field used to describe this product or service when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: ProductOrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization producing the product and/or service

ForeignField.name: ProductOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization producing the product and/or service

ForeignField.name: ProductServiceTypeID
ForeignField.phrase: Product or Service Type|A combined field used to describe this product or service type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: ProductorServiceID
ForeignField.phrase: Product or Service|Whether this is a product or service

CodeField.name: ProductorService
CodeField.phrase: Product or Service|Whether this is a product or service

ForeignField.name: ProductServiceCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group products or services of similar types

CodeField.name: ProductServiceCategory
CodeField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group products or services of similar types

ForeignField.name: ProductServiceTypeDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A brief but thorough description of the specific type of product or service
ForeignField.sample: Bulk skinless almonds are shipped in a pallet box weighing 1200 pounds.

ForeignField.name: ProductServiceType
ForeignField.phrase: Product or Service Type|A combined field used to describe this product or service type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: ProductLifeCycleID
ForeignField.phrase: Product Life Cycle|The stage of the product life cycle the product had attained at the time of the reported loss

CodeField.name: ProductLifeCycle
CodeField.phrase: Product Life Cycle|The stage of the product life cycle the product had attained at the time of the reported loss

ForeignField.name: ProdServStatusID
ForeignField.phrase: Status|The present status of the product or service

CodeField.name: ProdServStatus
CodeField.phrase: Status|The present status of the product or service

ForeignField.name: ProdServDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A detailed description of the product and/or service
ForeignField.sample: The Monterey Frozen Burrito comes in four variaties: Bean, Beef, Beef and Bean; and, Cheese.

ForeignField.name: ProdServ
ForeignField.phrase: Product or Service|A combined field used to describe this product or service when associating it with other records

TableField.name: MethodofHarm
TableField.phrase: Method of Harm|Description of the method of contamination or adulteration likely to result in harm
TableField.sample: The ice cream absorbed ammonia while in storage. The ammonia concentration in the product is capable of making consumers ill.

TableField.name: DefectOriginID
TableField.phrase: Origin of Defect|The origin of the identified or alledged defect in the product

CodeField.name: DefectOrigin
CodeField.phrase: Origin of Defect|The origin of the identified or alledged defect in the product

TableField.name: DefectDescription
TableField.phrase: Defect Description|Description of the defect associated with the product or service loss
TableField.sample: Leaking evaporators within the cold storage building.

TableField.name: HazardDescription
TableField.phrase: Hazard Description|Description of the hazard presented to the user or consumer
TableField.sample: A consumer risk becoming ill if the product, contaminated with the ammonia, is consumed.

TableField.name: SupplierRelated
TableField.phrase: Supplier Related|Whether the potential product harm is the result of a supplier of raw ingredients, component parts, or packaging materials

TableField.name: TraceNumber
TableField.phrase: Trace Number|The trace number associated with the product and/or service involved in the loss

TableField.name: BatchNumber
TableField.phrase: Batch Number|The batch number associated with the product and/or service involved in the loss

TableField.name: LotNumber
TableField.phrase: Lot Number|The lot number associated with the product and/or service involved in the loss

TableField.name: ModelNumber
TableField.phrase: Model Number|The model number associated with the product and/or service involved in the loss

TableField.name: ProductionDate
TableField.phrase: Production Date|Date and time the subject product was produced

TableField.name: ShippingDate
TableField.phrase: Shipping Date|Date and time the subject product was shipped

TableField.name: ProductionReviewDate
TableField.phrase: Production Review Date|Date and time the production records were reviewed and quantities recorded

TableField.name: AmountProduced
TableField.phrase: Amount Produced|The amount of product produced that may also be affected

TableField.name: AmountProducedUnitID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: AmountProducedCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: AmountProducedCategory
CodeField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: AmountProducedUnit
ForeignField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: ProductionConclusion
TableField.phrase: Production Conclusion|Conclusion drawn from review of the production records and likelihood for additional product involvement
TableField.sample: Production amounts are irrelevant to this claim of loss

TableField.name: ProcessReviewDate
TableField.phrase: Process Review Date|Date and time the in-process records were reviewed and quantities recorded

TableField.name: AmountInProcess
TableField.phrase: Amount In Process|The amount of product that is in process that may also be affected

TableField.name: AmountInProcessUnitID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: AmountInProcessCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: AmountInProcessUnit
ForeignField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: ProcessConclusion
TableField.phrase: Process Conclusion|Conclusion drawn from review of the process records and likelihood for additional product involvement
TableField.sample: Process amounts are irrelevant to this claim of loss

TableField.name: ShippingReviewDate
TableField.phrase: Shipping Review Date|Date and time the shipping records were reviewed and quantities recorded

TableField.name: AmountShipped
TableField.phrase: Amount Shipped|The amount of product shipped that may also be affected

TableField.name: AmountShippedUnitID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: AmountShippedCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: AmountShippedCategory
CodeField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: AmountShippedUnit
ForeignField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: ShippingConclusion
TableField.phrase: Shipping Conclusion|Conclusion drawn from review of the shipping records and likelihood for additional product involvement
TableField.sample: It was determined that 2,000,000 units were shipped from warehouse and are likely contaminated

TableField.name: InventoryReviewDate
TableField.phrase: Inventory Review Date|Date and time the inventory records were reviewed and quantities recorded

TableField.name: AmountinInventory
TableField.phrase: Amount In Inventory|The amount of product in inventory that may also be affected

TableField.name: AmountinInventoryUnitID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: AmountinInventoryCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: AmountinInventoryCategory
CodeField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: AmountinInventoryUnit
ForeignField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: InventoryConclusion
TableField.phrase: Inventory Conclusion|Conclusion drawn from review of the inventory records and likelihood for additional product involvement
TableField.sample: It was determined that 21,321,004 potentaill contaminated units remain in the warehouse

TableField.name: ProductAvailable
TableField.phrase: Product Available|Whether the product resulting in loss is available for viewing

TableField.name: PresentDesc
TableField.phrase: Present Location|A detailed description of the location where the product causing the loss can be seen.
TableField.sample: The customer has transported the damaged product to US Cold Storage for hold until the matter can be resolved.

TableField.name: PresentAddress1
TableField.phrase: Present Address|First physical street address of the location where the product resulting in loss can be seen

TableField.name: PresentAddress2
TableField.phrase: Present Address|Second physical street address of the location where the product resulting in loss can be seen; such as, suite number or p.o. box

TableField.name: PresentCountyID
TableField.phrase: Incurred County|A combined field used to track and associate counties

ForeignField.name: PresentCountryID
ForeignField.phrase: Present Country|The name of the country where the product or service associated with the incurred loss can be viewed

ForeignField.name: PresentCountry
ForeignField.phrase: Present Country|The name of the country where the product or service associated with the incurred loss can be viewed

ForeignField.name: PresentStateID
ForeignField.phrase: Present State|The name of the state where the product or service associated with the incurred loss can be viewed

ForeignField.name: PresentState
ForeignField.phrase: Present State|The name of the state where the product or service associated with the incurred loss can be viewed

ForeignField.name: PresentCounty
ForeignField.phrase: Present Country|The name of the country where the product or service associated with the incurred loss can be viewed

TableField.name: PresentCity
TableField.phrase: Present City|City where the product resulting in loss can be seen

TableField.name: PresentPostalCode
TableField.phrase: Present Postal Code|Postal code used to direct mail to the physical street address where the product resulting in loss can be seen

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: LossProdServAssn
CombinedField.phrase: Product or Service Association|A combined field used to describe this product or service association when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Mattias Thorslund; Active Agenda, HQ; Packaging Area; 01-01-2004 | Monterey Frozen Burrito - Bean; MB-B-2003-P14

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
